long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows an end user to fill the monthly attendance report automatically.
The extension will keep the userId and the password to the 'Timewatch' portal using the browser local storage without sharing it or sending it.
The extension allows to open the attendance report, which is basically to login to the attendance portal, and to fill the working day hours using 9:00-18:00 daily
